title: Dixiana ( 1930) Comedy, Drama, Music Pre Code Movie

sources.title: Dixiana 1930 Comedy Drama Music Pre Code Movie
sources.description: Dixiana (Bebe Daniels), a Louisiana songstress, is coveted by both playboy Royal Montague (Ralf Harolde) and well-off Carl Van Horn (Everett Marshall). Initially, she pledges herself to Carl, but, when his mother (Jobyna Howland) objects to her lifestyle and her show business friends Peewee (Bert Wh eeler) and Ginger (Robert Woolsey), Dixiana finds her engagement on the skids. Royal tries to capitalize on the breakup, but Dixiana, hoping to rekindle her romance, has several tricks up her sleeve.
